source_objects.title: Personal Brand Building
source_objects.description: Learn best practices and advice on how to create a compelling personal brand.

items.title: Creating Your Own Signature Personal Brand 101
items.headline: Learn how to go from average to fabulous in 15 minutes without breaking the bank.
objectives_summary: Learn How To Go From Average To Fabulous Without Breaking The Bank.
At the end of this course you will understand the A,B,C, & D of your Professional / Personal Brand and how critiically important it is to your success at all times.

items.title: Building Your Brand
items.headline: Learn how to market yourself until you are the biggest brand in your field.
objectives_summary: By the end of the course, you will be able to have all the information you need to become among the best known people in your field.
In this course, you will learn how to draw the right kind of attention to yourself and your work.
In this course, you will learn the keys to mastering social media.

objectives_summary: Personal Branding
Expert Image
Brand Management

items.title: Sports Blogs 101: How to Start a Sports Blog
items.headline: Turn your passion for sports into a legitimate career...even without prior blogging experience or industry connections.
objectives_summary: Your "why" for starting a sports blog.
Discover your perfect niche.
Become a sports blog owner within minutes.

items.title: LinkedIn for Beginners: Build a Kickass LinkedIn Profile

visible_instructors.title: Paul Connell

items.headline: Optimize Your LinkedIn Profile | Maximize Job Search | Get noticed by Recruiters | Become a Job Magnet | Master LinkedIn
objectives_summary: Step-by-step tutorial to build a strong LinkedIn Social Media Presence
Prepare a keyword-rich, optimized LinkedIn profile that gets outstanding results in your job search
Build Your Personal Brand on LinkedIn® and discover networking techniques with focused outcomes

items.title: How to Become a Small Business Networking Ninja!
items.headline: How to Get MORE REFERRALS and MORE NEW CUSTOMERS by Becoming a Master Networker and Communicator in your community!
objectives_summary: The goal and objective of this course is to show you exactly how to generate more referral and more new business by becoming a much better networker in your business community. You will learn the importance of precise wording and phrasing when communicating your message to other small business networking individuals in your community. By the end of this course you should be able to go out and generate more referrals and more new business by using the tools and strategies you gain.

items.title: Build Your Personal Brand in 4 Easy Steps

visible_instructors.title: Dan Schawbel
visible_instructors.job_title: Entrepreneur and New York Times Bestselling Author
visible_instructors.name: Dan

items.headline: The Brand Building Guide to learning how to discover, create, communicate and maintain your brand for career & success.
objectives_summary: Understand what personal branding is, why it's important and how it applies to your situation.
Learn all of the many aspects of personal branding.
Be able to use the DCCM personal branding process to your advantage (Discover, Create, Communicate and Maintain).

items.title: Write Now! Write Your Book and Spread it Like a Virus
items.headline: How to be a Best-Selling Author
objectives_summary: Write their best-selling book with a clear idea that can change someone else's life
Market their books more effectively
Tap into the power of building your tribe to spread your idea.

items.title: Online Reputation Management for Personal Brands
items.headline: Learn online reputation management for people and personal brands and make them shine on the web
objectives_summary: How to remove negative links on Google and other search engines
How to bury negative content with positive content
How to get positive reviews and testimonials for their brands

items.headline: Invent and rebuild yourself
objectives_summary: What is Personal branding and what does it have to do with your job search or career development.

How to interact with business people in an engaging and polished manner. Why your executive outfit is important for making a great first impression.

items.title: Personal Branding:Branding-Building Standout Personal Brand™
items.headline: Personal Branding unpacked:Entrepreneurs and professionals with a Standout Personal Brand™ are paid more than colleagues
objectives_summary: 	If you want to Standout as an expert in your target market, enrol in this course.
	Discover your profitable skills and experience. In the learning resources find strategies to package and sell them using your new learned Standout Personal Branding™ skills.
	Become visible to your prospects, clients and customers as an authority and expert by building a Standout Personal Brand™
